website_summaries.verdict: While it can be a bit tight for larger drones, this is a water resistant and well designed backpack that is also very comfortable.
pros: Compatible with quads up to a Phantom 4
Features a padded dual-compartment interior with lots of storage space
Wide straps distribute weight and make it more comfortable to carry
cons: A bit of a tight fit for larger quads
Some buyers say the zippers on this option are not very durable

customer_reviews.title: Good drone bag
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag to carry/store my Phantom 2 drone (same general size as the Phantom 3). The bag seems to be well made and holds my drone, controller and accessories. It is very light weight yet sturdy and comfortable to carry. Plenty of storage compartments for accessories, I carry my drone (with GoPro), controller, two batteries, charger, FPV monitor, props, some spares and tools. The only thing I couldn't fit was the sunshade for my FPV monitor (only because it is non-foldable and really bulky) for the shade I just added a small clip and attach it to the outside of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: The bag is pretty decent.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is pretty decent ... I like it , it works for me if your really in drones and you carry everything with you like tools and parts ... then this bag isn’t for you ... the bag holds Your quad copter two batteries Your charger the remote And the adapter that goes on the remote for your phone all that will fit in that bag
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this back again. The zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this back again. The zipper broke on day two and there wasn't enough compartments for all my drone equipment. And the bag felt very stiff (if that makes sense).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS TO BE VERY GOOD PRODUCT. GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS TO BE VERY GOOD PRODUCT. GOOD PRICE. EXCELLENT DELIVERY. IT WAS EASY. I CANNOT WAIT TIL CHRISTMAS MORNING WHEN SON OPENS DRONE AND BACKPACK-WHICH HAS VARIOUS ACCESSORIES STASHED INSIDE. THANK YOU VERY MUCH! DRONE OWNERS SHOULD HAVE THIS TYPE OF BACKPACK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product as stated and of good quality
customer_reviews.text: First everything perfectly, but no room to spare. If you want just the drone and to save on space on the go, this is your bag. If you want to take more and don't have an issue with space, I would move to a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son's drone and all the extras fit perfect inside the backpack. He is very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: klj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is light and everything fits good inside with my DJI Phantom 3 pro
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I liked it very much because I can also put my ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it very much because I can also put my dslr inside. It's a good drone backpack. My drone is safe inside.
customer_reviews.author: ytsejam

customer_reviews.title: A well-made case but a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a DJI Phantom 3 Standard. Everything fits but just barely. Not sure exactly how the controller is supposed to be stored in the upper compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Poe

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good. I haven't used it much yet
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I haven't used it much yet, but needless to say, I love the color and my DJI P3S fits perfectly. The only downside is that there is not much room for accessories, but overall, I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MadSiss Productions

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack. It was made really well
customer_reviews.text: Very nice backpack. It was made really well. The only thing it's missing is a place for the propellers. I have an X star Premium drone and it fits perfect with 2 extra batteries controller and iPad but once again you have to make a space and be careful for your props to fit and not get messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Maddcutter2010

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for DJI drones(exept Mavic) so if you have ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for DJI drones(exept Mavic) so if you have Phantom series drones it will be perfect. The price is unbeatable, all the DJI bags out there at least start from $150.00 and hard shell so you can not fit your tablet, you don't need extra bag for all your accessories. This bag has plenty of space inside to fit tablet, extra memory card and your drone accessories. You won't be disappointed with this bag i can tell you that. So far pretty satisfied. Thank you seller :)
customer_reviews.author: Net&Tech guy

customer_reviews.title: Good case for Phantom
customer_reviews.text: I selected this case mainly because I wasn't able to find a case that had a good cutout for the Phantom 3 Standard controller (as it's different than the other Phantom 3 controllers). The drone fits nice and deep in this bag and the motors are protected. There isn't a ton of space for extras. The build quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L Denkers

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. It's big but not so much so that it's awkward. Fits Phantom 4 pro, remote, extra batteries, iPad air, and other accessories easily. Quality seems great. I've had it a few weeks now and it's working out great.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. It protects my Phantom with much room for other items. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Parente

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice bag for a SMALL quadcopter
customer_reviews.text: The quadcopter fit's well, but the controller not so good
customer_reviews.author: RBISIT

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my DJI Phantom 2 Vision Plus. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This has plenty of room for extra batteries or anything you need to take with you
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Zippers Blew
customer_reviews.text: Like the product but the zippers blew out, I have had the pack for two months used it 6 times...disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Robert J knutson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can now carry around my phantom 4 pro. But it is a big bag
customer_reviews.author: Evan Hill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits my P4P perfectly and is light weight and comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Eric E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. I have a dji Phantom 4 pro plus and it fits well, along with three batteries.
customer_reviews.author: S. Browne

customer_reviews.title: Bad Zippers
customer_reviews.text: The top zipper broke on the second day of owning it. Very cheap
customer_reviews.author: Mick Robb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: "perfect" my phantom 4 fits perfectly with room for extra battery, cords and filters. Comfortable carry too!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra bennewitz

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it the little rope pills on the zipper came apart the first time I used the zipper but I like the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks great, and my phantom 3 standard fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, looks great, and my phantom 3 standard fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Doug F

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very happy with my babys bag again another job well done by Amazon. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and great backback. Fits my Phantom 3 standard perfectly with plenty of room for my accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Bmackaveli

customer_reviews.title: Good bag but bad zippers
customer_reviews.text: I liked the bag and could get all my equipment in it but one of the zippers came off after our lyrics a few times of use. Not too pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the backpack but unfortunately I had to return it. It was too small for the drone my husband currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Mslela

customer_reviews.title: A Laptop Slot Would Be Nice
customer_reviews.text: It holds the Phantom 3 Standard just fine. My only complaint is the lack of extra storage. I understand the drone takes a lot of space but there has to be somewhere that a laptop slot could be added.
customer_reviews.author: Rookzer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bag. Great quality and really easy to fit my DJI Phantom 3 with an extra battery and all my charging cables! If your looking for a nice bag to carry your drone in I would recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Well made travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lightweight material yet sturdy enough for sufficient protection. Some flexibility in padding to be able to use with various size Phantoms.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Small

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for a couple of months now and its held up really well. I carry a phantom 3 standard, 3 batteries, controller, antenna range extender, props and guards, and it all fits in very nicely. The only thing i'm not a big fan of is that the top storage does not really have a secure way of holding the controller and other extras in place but it's not that much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All in one bag!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my phantom with extended landing gear and gopro gamble. Fits like a glove. Holds everything with pockets to spare.. Much cooler than lugging a big box around.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Helton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the phantom 3. Fit everything including iPad mini, controller, spare batteries. Very nice backpack.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Roos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit perfect In this bag. My husband was happy to put his drone in it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria llanos

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with the bag
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the bag. The drone and remote fit perfect and I still have room for my GoPro, plus I find it to be a good quality bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drone backpack
customer_reviews.text: it's very nice backpack for the price. It's realy Bower, looks exactly like on the pictures. nice fit all ph 3 drones staff. whole drones section pads are removable (velcro) and might be use like common backpack or photopack, if you add some additional velcro pads.
customer_reviews.author: leas

customer_reviews.title: Case fits my Phantom 3 Standard pretty tight with the removable prop guard brackets installed
customer_reviews.text: Case fits my Phantom 3 Standard pretty tight with the removable prop guard brackets installed, but it fits. I have the PS3, one battery, prop guards (detached), transmitter with Argtek mod, all 3 omni antennae as well as all 3 flat panel antennae, Inspire shoulder harness lanyard, 2 sets of props, and all chargers fit in the case nicely. zippers and case seem well made and am very happy with the purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Was very pleased with my purchase only thing is I wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with my purchase, fits everything well including a tablet. only thing is I wish it would have some sort of battery holder as the bag just has em in a loose compartment. Other than that Its perfect to be mobile friendly for my Phantom 3 Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Jnca

customer_reviews.title: Its design is brilliant as well as the craftsmanship behind it
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is made extremely well and is very very roomy....holds everything and a lot of spare items as well. The only drawback to this item is one of the zipper pulls has a flaw in its design. The pull itself slips off one of the zippers. I have already lost the pull because of this. None of the other zippers on this backpack are made this way. It makes no sense. I would have given this backpack 5 stars if it wasn't for this as this backpack has room for everything you need and the extras as well. Its design is brilliant as well as the craftsmanship behind it.
customer_reviews.author: TechMan502

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: product was missing one minor strap, but was discounted for that,delivered as promised
customer_reviews.author: shoppers voice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this for carry my drone safely. It has room for my blade guards, and other extras.
customer_reviews.author: l bates

customer_reviews.title: Very nice backpack for Phantom 3 Standard
customer_reviews.text: Everything (Phantom 3 Standard) fit perfectly. The copter, blades, battery and controller all fit with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not really useful if you want to carry anything besides the drone...
customer_reviews.text: As one of the best selling backpacks on the site I was expecting a more ergonomic bag. This bag has essentially two pockets and the internal ones on the padding are close to useless. They are very small and don't hold much of anything. There is no internal means for keeping things organized. Aside from the drone you just throw everything in the bag and hope for the best. Returned it and got the Manfrotto instead. Unless you are looking for the barest of bones bag, don't get this one.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the DJI Phantom Standard perfectly with plenty of room for other things.
customer_reviews.author: Gargasd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is an amazing product. It was a little pricey but well worth it. Very sturdy feelings backpack all the way down to the zipper pulls. Efficient space. Great colors. Overall great item.
customer_reviews.author: Surfinggstud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. Phantom 3 4k, fits just perfect. With accessories. Excellent seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Drone Quadcopter Backpack Carrying Case For DJI P4 P3A P3P DJI Phantom 4 Phantom 1, 2, 3 Advanced Professional Quadcopter 4K UHD Video Camera and Similar Models (Black/Red)
product_meta.description:
The Backpack Carrying Case will accommodate a drone such as a quadcopter up to 11.4 x 11.4 x 7.25" in size. 

Compatible aircraft include the DJI Phantom 1, 2, Phantom 3 Standard, Advanced, Professional, Phantom 4 Quadcopter Drone and Similar Models. 

Additional compartments provide space for the transmitter (radio controller), spare batteries, a charger, and other larger items. There are also pockets for slimmer items, such as smartphones and memory cards.

Wide straps for balanced weight distribution
Padded dual-compartment interior protects drone and drone accessories from the elements
Water-resistant fabric and high-grip zipper pulls
feature_bullets: COMPATIBLE WITH DJI Phantom 4, 4 PRO Professional, 4 Pro+, 4 Professional+ - Phantom 3 Standard, Advanced, Professional
CONVENIENT POCKETS: 4 Inner Pockets for Smartphone / Tablet / Memory Cards.
WATER RESISTANT Fabric and high-grip zipper pulls.
WIDE STRAPS For Balanced Weight Distribution.
INNER DIMENSIONS: up to 11.4 x 11.4 x 7.2" - EXTERIOR DIMENSIONS: 20 x 16 x 8".

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
